title: HiSET Time Management Prompt
prompt:
Time management is an issue at your workplace that often increases stress. Good time management practices include making a schedule, grouping like tasks together, checking email only at specific times, and avoiding multitasking. Your company is printing a special newsletter to encourage good time management practices.

Write an essay for the company newsletter in which you argue that every employee should implement one good time management practice. Think carefully about what reasons will convince your coworkers to change their behavior.
feedback: Thank you for your response! We will grade your essay and get you feedback soon.
